title: Question about honor leveling
body:
So , i have had a 2 week ban after honor system arrived , time passed , started playing again , and i have been playing for like over a month , winning a lot , receiving a lot of honors and trying to act as non-toxic as i could , and i'm still honor level 0 .

Is there any way to tell how much progress do i have towards level 1 ? Is it bugged? or it's just that i can't level up to honor level 1 anymore?

edit*: haven't had any other penalties besides queue time dodges , if that counts not anything serious like 20 minutes queue , just 5 min queue , sometimes 15 in rare occasions

replies.body: They refuse to tell you that. I've sent in a ticket and got non-answers for my trouble and I'm still honor 2.

I went ahead and checked your current honor progression and you *are* earning honors at the normal rate, so no worries there. It does look like even though you haven't gotten any punishments recently, certain rather negative chat logs are still being holding some weight.

thanks for the reply , i have an additional question

are you allowed to tell me if i'm close to leveling up in honor or not? if yes , could you please tell me if i'm close to leveling up , i'm midway trough , or not even close?
